name: 火球术
describe: 对单个目标造成<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillLogic[200011].hurt_number/10+$SkillLogic[200011].grow_coefficient*$UserSkill[200011].level/10}%</font>火焰伤害，有<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillLogic[200011].buff_probability/10}%</font>概率烧伤

name: 饮血
describe: 每次梅琳娜给对方造成伤害，该伤害<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillBuff[200012].basic_permil/10}%</font>转化为生命

name: 闪电箭
describe: 对最多<font color='#00FF00'>$SkillLogic[200013].target_number</font>个目标造成<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillLogic[200013].hurt_number/10+$SkillLogic[200013].grow_coefficient*$UserSkill[200013].level/10}%</font>气属性伤害

name: 血魅
describe: 当生命值恢复到<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillLeader[200014].value/10}%</font>以上后，有<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillLeader[200014].probability/10}%</font>的概率用自己的<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillLeader[200014].cost_value/10}%</font>血来换取对方单位的控制权，持续<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillBuff[200014].continuous_time/1000}</font>秒

name: 冰柩
describe: 对单个目标造成<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillLogic[200015].hurt_number/10+$SkillLogic[200015].grow_coefficient*$UserSkill[200015].level/10}%</font>冰冻伤害，有<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillLogic[200015].buff_probability/10}%</font>概率冰冻对手，并<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillLeader[200015].logic_probability/10}%</font>概率对非BOSS单位一击必杀

name: 治疗术
describe: 将<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillLogic[200021].hurt_number/10+$SkillLogic[200021].grow_coefficient*$UserSkill[200021].level/10}%</font>的魔法伤害转换为回复本方单个伙伴生命

name: 圣光惩戒
describe: 每当队友受到伤害时，有<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillLeader[200022].probability/10}%</font>概率触发弗莱娅对攻击者进行<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillLogic[200022].hurt_number/10+$SkillLogic[200022].grow_coefficient*$UserSkill[200022].level/10}%</font>法术伤害反击

name: 驱散
describe: 当队友收到debuff时，有<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillLeader[200023].probability/10+$SkillLeader[200023].grow_coefficient*$UserSkill[200023].level/10}%</font>的概率驱散队友身上的debuff

name: 同行
describe: 连接所有本方单位，单体所受伤害平均分配给所有连接的单位，持续<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillBuff[200024].continuous_time/1000+$SkillBuff[200024].grow_coefficient*$UserSkill[200024].level/1000}%</font>秒

name: 圣疗
describe: 将法术伤害的<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillLogic[200025].hurt_number/10+$SkillLogic[200025].grow_coefficient*$UserSkill[200025].level/10}%</font>转换为自然之力回复本方所有单位，并为本方最低生命单位回复<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillLogic[200026].hurt_number/10+$SkillLogic[200026].grow_coefficient*$UserSkill[200026].level/10}%</font>生命值

name: 狼心
describe: 当生命值低于<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillLeader[200031].value/10}%</font>后，有<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillLeader[200031].probability/10}%</font>的概率提升<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillBuff[200031].basic_permil/10}%</font>攻击力，持续<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillBuff[200031].continuous_time/1000+$SkillBuff[200031].grow_coefficient*$UserSkill[200031].level/1000}%</font>秒

name: 嗜血
describe: 当敌人死亡时，有<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillLeader[200032].probability/10+$SkillLeader[200032].grow_coefficient*$UserSkill[200032].level/10}%</font>的概率可以使自己立即获得一个行动回合

name: 威吓
describe: 对敌方单体嚎叫，使其行动条倒退<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillLogic[200033].timeline/10+$SkillLogic[200033].grow_coefficient*$UserSkill[200033].level/10}%</font>行程

name: 扫击
describe: 对单排区域内的所有敌方造成<font color='#00FF00'>2</font>段伤害，分别为<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillLogic[200034][1].hurt_number/10+$SkillLogic[200034].grow_coefficient*$UserSkill[200034].level/10}%</font>的伤害和<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillLogic[200034][2].hurt_number/10+$SkillLogic[200034].grow_coefficient*$UserSkill[200034].level/10}%</font>的伤害

name: 报复
describe: 聚集友方所有单位被伤害生命值的<font color='#00FF00'>{$SkillLogic[200035].hurt_number/10+$SkillLogic[200035].grow_coefficient*$UserSkill[200035].level/10}%</font>，一次输出给敌方<font color='#00FF00'>$SkillLogic[200035].target_number</font>个单位
